### Number of COVID-19 tests (positive + negative) mapped to OC zip codes

```{r setup, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  fig.align = "center",
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
)
```


```{r libraries}
source("code/map-functions.R")
```


```{r generate-tests-map}
tests_covid_zip_data <- readRDS("data/tests_map_data.rds")

date_seq <- zoo::as.yearmon(
  seq(as.Date("2020-03-01"), tests_covid_zip_data$max_date_in_data, by = "months"), 
  "%m/%Y"
)

gen_map_gif(
  plot_data = tests_covid_zip_data$tests_plot_data, 
  socal_shp_file = "data/shape-files/socal-zip/Zipcode_boundary_scag_2009.shp", 
  ca_shp_file = "data/shape-files/ca-counties/cnty19_1.shp", 
  legend_label = tests_covid_zip_data$tests_legend_label, 
  month_seq = date_seq, 
  var_type = "tests"
)
```


```{r display-tests-map}
htmltools::includeHTML("docs/tests-map-gif.html")
```


Data provided by the [Orange County Health Care Agency](https://www.ochealthinfo.com).  
Most recent date in data used was `r tests_covid_zip_data$max_date_in_data`.  
Last updated on `r lubridate::today()`.
